stories.title: That Blinking Office Voice Mail? Don’t Worry. Everyone Else Ignores It, Too

stories.text: I was able to get to Page 28 of the front page (https://news.ycombinator.com/news?p=28), with 820 total stories. It appears this number isn't fixed (I saw 818 total a few minutes before). What determines how many pages you can see - server memory limits?
stories.title: Ask HN: How many pages come after the front page?
Hz PC monitor prototype is fastest panel ever
MacBooks Are Experiencing Battery Drain in Sleep Mode
Etsy Moves from React to Preact to Lower Migration Risks

stories.text:
Would you consider creating eCommerce features from scratch? I'm getting sick of frameworks getting out of date and growing to massive levels of complexity. Yet a shopping cart, payment processor integration, catalogue management are all solved problems in an eCommerce solution.

I want to make something simple and tailored to my little specialised shop. Would you spend the time building from scratch?
stories.title: As HN: Would you consider creating eCommerce features from scratch?
Longest lightning bolt record: 477 miles over 3 states – AP News
